summary: Implemented spec 05-layout.md with responsive sidebar navigation, lazy-loaded routes, transaction log component, and stub pages for all 8 scenarios
decisions: Created stub pages for all 8 scenarios since they will be implemented in specs 06-13
Each stub page uses ScenarioPage template with useTransactionLog hook for consistent structure
Added data-testid attributes to all interactive elements for E2E testing
Created index.ts barrel files for layout and transaction components for clean imports
